group_1.textRight: It's grown a lot bigger!

group_1.textLeft: That must mean a significant number of people@have fallen to it...

group_1.textRight: While we were busy fighting each other...

group_1.textLeft: We were so focused on what was in front of@us that we forgot what's important.
As Magical Girls...no, as people, we should@have known better.

group_1.textRight: Hey, hang on a second! Don't get all@depressed, everyone!

group_1.textLeft: But we really need to learn something@from this.

group_1.textRight: You're right, we shouldn't have gotten all@caught up in the turf war...
But the reason why the Labyrinth has grown...
It's just a hunch, but I think it grew@because we Magical Girls were fighting.
WE were the unlucky sacrifices who fell@to the Witch.
Magical Girls. Us.
Basically, we were its meal.
Yup.

group_1.textLeft: I feel like such a fool.

group_1.textRight: We acted exactly how it wanted... I'm@speechless.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...but we'll get back at it.

group_1.textRight: There are a number of things we should've@done differently.
But right now, we need to work towards a@solution.
Yachan!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let's go! Stay vigilant, everyone!

group_1.textCenter: (Having been here before, I should've been@able to predict this would happen.)

group_1.textRight: Aww, what's the matter? Are you scared?
I don't blame you. You're getting weaker,@after all!

group_1.textLeft: You're...me?! How? What are you talking@about?

group_1.textRight: C'mon, Mifuyu...
You can't use your powers like you used to.@You can't, because you're weaker.
You'll just get in the way at this rate.

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's not true! Don't say such nonsense!

group_1.textRight: You suffered and suffered.
But in the end you'll end up holding your@friends back and getting them killed!

group_1.textLeft: Stop it! That's not true! I...

group_1.textRight: I feel so bad for Yachan! She trusted you,@and you're going to kill her.

group_1.textLeft: No...that's not possible! I'm not weaker!

group_1.textRight: Sooo! Before that happens...
I'll kill you, as you.
